short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ease eye strain. Dark Read is a simple Chrome extension to change the background color of a web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dark Read is a light weight dark mode Chrome extension that lets you transform the look of any webpage theme with just a few clicks. With its simple interface and intuitive controls, you can easily change the background colour, text colour, contrast and brightness of any webpage to create a more comfortable reading experience.

Whether you're browsing late at night or just want to customize the look of your favourite websites, Dark Read is the perfect accessibility tool. It's never been easier to change the colour scheme of any webpage.

Features:

ğŸ“Pre-set Page Colours

ğŸ“Contrast Controls

ğŸ“Brightness Controls

ğŸ“Sepia Control

ğŸ“Colour Temperature

ğŸ“Colour Enhancement

ğŸ“Black and White Mode

ğŸ“8Bit Black and White Mode

ğŸ“Blank out Images and Background Images

Install Dark Read today and enjoying a more comfortable, customizable browsing experience. With its powerful features and intuitive controls, it's the perfect tool for anyone who wants to make the most of their web browsing experience.

Please note: This extension is under development and still has a few bugs. 
It does not function on certain webpages like the Chrome Web Store or any Chrome settings pages.
